snippet.title: Fresh prototype gameplay
snippet.description:
Check out our latest trailer! This sneak peek shows off our fresh prototype gameplay where every day brings new life to your surroundings. We’re hard at work on the game and have added multiple new features - the journey is just beginning.

Here’s what you’ll see:
• Grow Unique Plants - and watch them spread over time.
• Keep the Balance - Find that perfect sweet spot to maintain harmony in your garden.
• Meet Cool Critters & Quirky Locals – Discover fun characters and unexpected visitors.
• Build Cosy Habitats & Craft Items – Create homes for the bugs you discovered, and craft items that will help in your journey.

Like the game? Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3243350/Slumbering_Woods/

Have a feature you like? Leave a comment below!
